title: CHAPPUIS HALDER & CO.
text: Automating the Greater China sales dashboard on Power BI, Conducted an IT assessment framework, Authored and designed the Project Inthanon-LionRock Phase 1 report.

title: SYMPHONY
text: Part of the Unicorn club, Symphony is a Goldman-Sachs led secure collaboration & workflow platform for financial services

title: ANGEL INVESTMENT NETWORK INDONESIA
text: ANGIN was born in as a project within a USAID-funded non profit entity named GEPI (Global Entrepreneurship Program Indonesia). GEPI was formally established in January 2011 by a group of 13 prominent business leaders in Indonesia.
